title: Samsung The Freestyle Review: Ultra portable projector that plays nice with Samsung and Appleâ€™s eco-system
content:
How much does branding and marketing matter in consumer tech? A lot, I’d argue, considering how iPhones are status symbols of sorts in chunks of the world, and that a mere new paint job would get months- or years-old Apple products much attention from media and fans. description: Samsung's new The Freestyle projector is sleek and stylish, with automatic keystoning and focus correction. Check out our review!
